author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Fix crash/endless loop bug in
svn_mergeinfo_to_string(), which occurs when the hash which is passed
in contains no elements.
* subversion/include/svn_mergeinfo.h
(svn_mergeinfo_to_string): Clarify API contract.  Break long lines.
(svn_rangelist_to_string): Tweak doc string wording for consistency
with svn_mergeinfo_to_string().
* subversion/libsvn_subr/mergeinfo.c
(svn_mergeinfo_to_string): Gate the majority of the function body in
a test for the presence of elements in the "input" hash.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Compress implementation of the
svn_mergeinfo_remove() API.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/mergeinfo.c
(svn_mergeinfo_remove): Refactor implementation.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Fix crash/endless loop bug in
svn_rangelist_to_string(), which occurs when the list which is passed
in contains no elements.
* subversion/include/svn_mergeinfo.h
(svn_rangelist_to_string): Clarify API contract.  Break long lines.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/mergeinfo.c
(svn_rangelist_to_string): Gate the majority of the function body in
a test for the presence of elements in the "input" list.

author: fitz
msg: Remove function declaration for svn_fs_base__rep_undeltify whose
actual function was removed in r7504 way back when it was
still named svn_fs__rep_undeltify.  Note that we diligently added a
pool parameter to the declaration in r13207 just 'cause we're that
kind of crowd.
* subversion/libsvn_fs/reps-strings.h (svn_fs_base__rep_undeltify):
Really *really* remove this time.

author: lundblad
msg: * CHANGES: Add entry for #2566.
